name: aware
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: knowing that something exists, or having knowledge or experience of a particular thing
trans_examp.trans_cn: 意识到的；明白的；知道的

example.eg: I wasn't even aware that he was ill.
Were you aware of the risks at the time?
example.egtrans: 你当时意识到危险了吗？

example.eg: She was well (= very) aware that he was married.
"Has Claude paid the phone bill?" "Not as far as I'm aware." (= I don't think so)
example.egtrans: “克劳德交电话费了吗？”“据我所知没有。”

example.eg: I suddenly became aware of (= started to notice) him looking at me.
example.egtrans: 我突然意识到他在看着我。

trans_examp.trans_en: having special interest in or experience of something and so knowing what is happening in that subject at the present time
trans_examp.trans_cn: 有…意识的；有…觉悟的；有…知识的
